name: Super Stacker Party
description:
The concept behind Super Stacker Party is simple and addictive. Simply stack blocks on top of each other. When all the blocks are used, you win! Sounds simple but each challenge gets more difficult.
Down the right side of the screen are the blocks that you are given, ordered from bottom to top. You place them on the stage, in order, attempting to build a stable structure. As each block is placed, it disappears from the supply-list at the right, revealing more blocks.
Each block has personality! Their facial expressions reflect how they are feeling about their safety: big smile when feeling secure, frown and fearful glances when feeling shaky. Use all the blocks and a timer starts ticking. If your tower of blocks can last 10 seconds you win!
